explains: n. （说话）流利；（做事）流畅，娴熟
wordGroup: fluency in english 流利英语

sentences.en: The team lacked fluency during the first half.
sentences.cn: 该队在上半场打得不够流畅。

sentences.en: His son was praised for speeches of remarkable fluency.
sentences.cn: 他的儿子非常流利的发言受到了表扬。

sentences.en: The research investigates how foreign speakers gain fluency.
sentences.cn: 这项研究旨在调查讲外语的人如何增加流利程度。
